laboratory_examinations.findings: Pathological examination revealed portions of fibrous cystic wall lined by a single layer of cuboidal and attenuated epithelial cells with adjacent normal hepatic parenchyma, findings consistent with MHL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The hepatic cyst regressed substantially, and calcification was noted at 14 years of age.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Five nodules in the left thyroid lobe were diagnosed as benign nodules.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At 4 years 9 months of age, a 2-cm nodule in the right lobe of the thyroid was resected and diagnosed pathologically as follicular adenoma.
